Thank you!Nicolette Dear <<Client Contact>>, My name is Nicolette Taylor a Consultant Services Advisor at MBO Partners. Your name was forwarded to me regarding Christina Pappa. On behalf of everyone here at MBO Partners, we look forward to working with your firm. MBO Partners is a corporate platform for consultants who find their own work and engagements. With over 20 years of experience administering professional contract workers, we understand the complexities of co-employment and 1099 risk. We mitigate tax-related contractor risks by making it easy for independent consultants to take advantage of our W-2 employment program. Through our program, they gain access to group benefits as well as a full suite of business processing services. We carry comprehensive business insurances, including General Liability, Errors and Omissions, and Workers’ Compensations policies that all our Associates are covered under. If you would like a more in-depth view of our services, please visit www.mbopartners.com. Included below is the standard agreement we use when engaging our Associates with their clients. Please review and complete it, and return a signed copy to me.
